name: Star Trail By Eudaemon
description:
Challenge your problem-solving skills.

Star Trail By Eudaemon is an “ice sliding” puzzle game, where you solve each board in the least moves possible. Grab keys on the board to open locks, sealing the goal. Flip switches to change the layout and open new paths. With various difficulties to unlock, you can always play the game on a level suitable to you.

The boards are created on the fly, resulting in a virtually endless supply of puzzles to solve. Each board is guaranteed to be solvable.

Everything in the game is created from the ground up.

No Ads.

No Microtransactions.

Supports Gamepad, Keyboard and Mouse.

Available Languages: English, Swedish.
